title_sort: louisa van velsor whitman to walt whitman, 5 october [1871]
title: Louisa Van Velsor Whitman to Walt Whitman, 5 October [1871]
text: Direct to George at Camden Iron Works, Camden N.J.OctOctober 5my dear walti send you the receipt for the money george has sent you by addams s expressAdams Express 100 dolrdollars he wants you to write to him at the above direction when you receive it all right to daytoday is the 4th i want to go down to the post office to morrowtomorrow and see if alls right with the order george is here but will go back to morrowtomorrow our company is here yet and i dontdon't know how long they will remain i have to work but i suppose i shall get through i will write again walter dear i got your letter satterdaySaturday with the money it come very acceptablegood biefrom dear mother Louisa Van Velsor Whitman to Walt Whitman, 5 October [1871]
